Package com.company.Utils

Class Writer

java.lang.Object
com.company.Utils.Writer
public class Writer
extends java.lang.Object
Utils class that contains methods to write to data files.

    • writeForex

      public void writeForex​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double> foreignExchange) throws java.io.IOException
      Write to foreign currency file
      Parameters:
      foreignExchange - Map from currency to exchange rate
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If the currency data file does not exist

    • writeNewPerson

      public void writeNewPerson​(Person p, boolean isCustomer) throws java.io.IOException
      Writes a person to the file.
      Parameters:
      p - Object of person
      isCustomer - If the person is a customer
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If person data file does not exist

    • grantNewAccount

      public void grantNewAccount​(Person p, Account account, boolean isCustomer) throws java.io.IOException, AccountAlreadyExistException
      Used when a person gets a new Account, if person does not exist, create a new record.
      Parameters:
      p - Person Object
      account - Instance of the new account
      isCustomer - If the person is a customer
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If any data file does not exist
      AccountAlreadyExistException - Taking an existing account as a new one

    • writeTxn

      public void writeTxn​(Transaction transaction) throws java.io.IOException
      Writes a transaction to the file.
      Parameters:
      transaction - Instance of transaction
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If file not exist

    • updateAccountToDisk

      public void updateAccountToDisk​(Account account) throws java.io.IOException
      Updates an account to disk, covers original record.
      Parameters:
      account - Instance of account
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - File not exist

    • deleteAccount

      public void deleteAccount​(AccountType type, java.lang.String id, Person p) throws java.io.IOException
      Delets an account from data file by ID.
      Parameters:
      type - Type of the account
      id - ID of the account
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Data file not exist

    • updateStock

      public void updateStock​(Stock stock, boolean ifDelete) throws java.io.IOException
      Updates a stock in data file, if the stock does not already exist, add to the list.
      Parameters:
      stock - Instance of a stock
      ifDelete - If this is a deletion operation
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - File not exist

    • writeCurTimeToReportDate

      public void writeCurTimeToReportDate() throws java.io.IOException
      Write current time to last report date. Called when reports are generated.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
